name: SSF1
title: Site-Specific Factor 1
subtitle: Measured Thickness (Depth), Breslow Measurement
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code MEASURED THICKNESS (Depth) of tumor (Breslow measurement), not size.  Record actual measurement in hundredths of millimeters from the pathology report.

**Note 2:**  Code the greatest measured thickness from any procedure performed on the lesion, whether it is described as a biopsy or an excision.  
* For example, if a punch biopsy with a thickness of 0.50 mm is followed by a re-excision with a thickness of residual tumor of 0.20 mm, code 050
* Do not add measurements together from different procedures
rows:
0.01 - 9.79 millimeters
(Code exact measurement in HUNDREDTHS of millimeter)  

Examples:
    001    0.01 millimeter
    002    0.02 millimeters
    010    0.1 millimeter
    074    0.74 millimeters
    100    1 millimeter
    105    1.05 millimeters
    979    9.79 millimeters
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case

Microinvasion; microscopic focus or foci only and no depth given
Not documented in patient record
Unknown; depth not stated
